model.player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.player.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, PlayerInterface

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements PlayerInterface, java.io.Serializable
    This class defines a Player playing in the poker game.

    The player is defined by a name, their current balance, a list of Card objects, and a boolean value to determine whether they've folded.

    Since:
    9/20/16
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Emmet Murray
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
